_source.text: After Blake Griffin, I'm betting Cousins is next most likely to win ROY, so I'm glad that you think Cousins will be better than projected using your models (third would be John Wall, but not due to productivity).

text: Cousins will be **better** **than** projected using your models (third would be **John** **Wall**, but not due to productivity).
